name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.expression: (CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZT_DEPT WHERE  PARENT = t1.`ID`) THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE  END )
getPSDEDataQueryCodeExps.name: ISLEAF

queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`DEPTSN`,
t1.`FUNCTION`,
t1.`GRADE`,
t1.`ID`,
(CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZT_DEPT WHERE  PARENT = t1.`ID`) THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE  END ) AS `ISLEAF`,
t1.`MANAGER`,
t1.`NAME`,
t1.`ORDER`,
t1.`PARENT`,
t11.`NAME` AS `PARENTNAME`,
t1.`PATH`,
t1.`POSITION`
FROM `zt_dept` t1 
LEFT JOIN `zt_dept` t11 ON t1.`PARENT` = t11.`ID`
